alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 10:17AM EST until February 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet and snow accumulations of up to one half inch and ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of East Central and Southeast Indiana and Central, Southwest and West Central Ohio. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain and freezing rain will develop this afternoon, changing to mostly freezing rain tonight. Some sleet may mix in at times tonight. This wintry mix will briefly change to snow before ending overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iln as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
